com.android.camerabrowser

Class MtpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.camerabrowser.MtpClient

  • public class MtpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps an application manage a list of connected MTP or PTP devices. It listens for MTP devices being attached and removed from the USB host bus and notifies the application when the MTP device list changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MtpClient.Listener
      An interface for being notified when MTP or PTP devices are attached or removed.

      • deleteObject

        public boolean deleteObject(java.lang.String deviceName,
                            int objectHandle)
        Deletes an object on the MTP or PTP device with the given USB device name.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name of the USB device
        objectHandle - handle of the object to delete
        Returns:
        true if the deletion succeeds

      • getObjectList

        public java.util.List<android.mtp.MtpObjectInfo> getObjectList(java.lang.String deviceName,
                                                               int storageId,
                                                               int objectHandle)
        Retrieves a list of MtpObjectInfo for all objects on the MTP or PTP device with the given USB device name and given storage ID and/or object handle. If the object handle is zero, then all objects in the root of the storage unit will be returned. Otherwise, all immediate children of the object will be returned. If the storage ID is also zero, then all objects on all storage units will be returned.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name of the USB device
        storageId - the ID of the storage unit to query, or zero for all
        objectHandle - the handle of the parent object to query, or zero for the storage root
        Returns:
        the list of MtpObjectInfo

      • getObject

        public byte[] getObject(java.lang.String deviceName,
                        int objectHandle,
                        int objectSize)
        Returns the data for an object as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name of the USB device containing the object
        objectHandle - handle of the object to read
        objectSize - the size of the object (this should match MtpObjectInfo.getCompressedSize()
        Returns:
        the object's data, or null if reading fails

      • getThumbnail

        public byte[] getThumbnail(java.lang.String deviceName,
                           int objectHandle)
        Returns the thumbnail data for an object as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name of the USB device containing the object
        objectHandle - handle of the object to read
        Returns:
        the object's thumbnail, or null if reading fails

      • importFile

        public boolean importFile(java.lang.String deviceName,
                          int objectHandle,
                          java.lang.String destPath)
        Copies the data for an object to a file in external storage.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name of the USB device containing the object
        objectHandle - handle of the object to read
        destPath - path to destination for the file transfer. This path should be in the external storage as defined by Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory()
        Returns:
        true if the file transfer succeeds
